page.title: 08TRANSPORT IN MOORSHOLM
page.content: 2 buses and a mini-bus transport the children the 4.5 km to school at Loftus. On Tuesdays and Fridays a Cleveland Transit bus takes the coast route to South Bank. This leaves the village at 9.30 am and returns at 2.00 pm. A United bus runs Monday to Saturday, leaving for Middlesbrough at 10.30 am and 3.00 pm and returning to Moorsholm at 1.00 pm and 8.00 pm., proceeding on to Scarborough. Other transport includes in excess of 160 cars and vans, 6 motorbikes, 6 caravans, 2 motorised horseboxes for horses and cattle, (Many other horseboxes for towing) and one cattlewagon.
